extendedInfo.description: This is the very early version of Crowd Control, the (soon-to-be) award winning app from Creature Feature Productions. Crowd Control is very simple: Anonymous, Localized Text-based Chat rooms. Talk to the people close to you, without knowing who or where they are. That's it.Give it a try! Currently you can control the distance of speech, but many more features are on the way.Use-cases: public parks, schools, streets, roads, talks, lectures, clubs, concerts - anywhere strangers gather in a common purpose.And check it out online - the early working version is up at crowdCTL.com! works on iphone too..

reviews.title: Waste o space
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t do anything. I am irritated to say the least
reviews.author: Julian Tagress

reviews.comment: The concept is splendid. Only needs to get more popular to b able to use well.

reviews.comment: Pretty awesome concept. Just need more people to add it so it can be used!

reviews.comment: Have not been able to use it yet. I will be exited when something happens

reviews.comment: Interesting idea. Needs users. A web presence wd be useful.Is it because the room was empty that there was no way to ~send~ the text I wrote? Galaxy s
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: What the hell is this? It does nothing. Is this hacking my phone? Something is fishy!

reviews.comment: You type something in and nothing? Don\'t waist your time unless your name is mike bernardo then you couldn\'t figure it o ut anyways...droidx
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: That\'s because it\'s in small-scale testing still. It\'s not fishy; you have to be near someone else with the app open to see it in action
